message: What is wrong with you guys? I am all about traditional roles, however, these women PERFORMED ALL that was required physically and emotionally. Every service man I spoke to said they would be proud to serve with them. And let me remind you that the greatest military on this earth next to the USA is the Israeli regime. EVERYONE that is a citizen serves but the elite forces have elite women. Therefore, put your 'distraction' in your pants and get the job done next to a woman that IS NOT distracted but focused and trained like you!

It's almost as if our country is being run by a failed businessman on his third marriage with no friends who's angry at our world and out to destroy it and doing a dam good job at it as well !! It's time now for the dictator and chief and his puppets to govern by our constitution we have a democracy Gov. not a theocracy Gov. ! We now have a Nazi white supremacist Steve B. running our county now thanks to trump ! THEIR IS MORE OF OUR KIDS KILLED TODAY WITH GUN VIOLENCE THEN TERRORISTS HELLO WAKE UP AND SEE WHAT THIS ISSUE IS REALLY ABOUT !! Our Country is now being Hi-Jacked by a White Supremacists Nazi Steve Bannon Style of Govern, and will we the people let them destroy our Constitution (Separation of Church and State) We have a huge problem with this team in Washington who will stop at nothing to destroy our Constitution !
I will somehow make this about politics! (So, umm.... """"Obama's takin' our Krisp""""-- no, no, lame. Sh*t, this is harder than it looks.)

No, Sidney. I don't believe there's any validity to the theory that the shooter was looking for our hero. Yes, he did attend school there at one time. But he's in the middle of his season on DWTS right now. In fact, he confirmed his whereabouts tonight with Megyn Kelly when he called into her show. But, I wondered myself if the name they are releasing is a bogus name (for the shooter) and if the feds are trying to cover up the truth about who he is. Hopefully will learn more about his identity from the victims who survived this travesty they are released and can share their stories. If this guy was targeting Christians, it raises a red flag in my mind! Could he have been an ISIS recrute? Could he just be some crazy white guy? We don't know! But, I wouldn't put it past POTUS to try to cover up the shooter's true identity if he was some sort of Muslim extremist. And we all know that this administration will politicize this situation to push for greater gun control in our nation. We can't afford to let the government ever take away our guns though! If that was to happen, we would not be able to protect ourselves from the government.
Awesome.
